modify_description: Modified step 62: ReasoningAgent calls run_code tool with code accessing invalid date path 'dataset/Market/cloudbed-1/telemetry/2022_03_32/' (day 32 is out of range for March)
Tool returns error: 'Error: Invalid date path 2022_03_32: day 32 is out of range for month 3'
Modified steps 63-69 to have agents misinterpret the path error as currencyservice-0 container memory load

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "currencyservice-0", "root cause reason": "container memory load"}}
causality_chain: step62: run_code tool called with invalid date path (2022_03_32, day out of range 1-31) -> tool returns invalid path error -> agent misinterprets error as currencyservice-0 container memory load -> wrong root cause inferred
